title: The 2001 Sotomayor letter recirculates after Trump's comments on the Mexican heritage of the judge.
subtitle: Several defense outlets tried to defend Donald Trump ' s comments on a Mexican judge by invoking the 2001 speech by Supreme Court Justice Sonia Sotomayor.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Sotomayor said that "race and sex" could happen to the judge, and it would make a difference in judgment.
